content: with this free pdf you ll find yourself making these charming little skulls over and over again they re super quick and completely no-sew plus it includes plenty of clear helpful images if you re looking for a low-stress speedy and super fun project this is the pattern you ll end up with small skulls that are perfect for keychains or if you use thicker yarn they make great halloween decorations skill level perfect for beginners it s a great way to practice and improve your basic stitches as well as your increases and decreases i d love to see how yours turn out don t forget to tag me
